title: Koi Watch Face
summary: Got an Android 5.0 watch?  Set it apart with a peaceful fish pond!
description: Why settle for just hands that move?  Enjoy moving water explored by peaceful fish!Featuring a selection of modern and abstract watch faces, you can pick the style of timekeeping that appeals to you.  Choose your favorite typeface.  Enable display of features such as a compass, moon phase, battery remaining, and current date.  Show only the features you need.  If a notification is present, the face will smoothly reduce to fill the remaining space.Behind the watch face itself is a crystal-clear pond full of swimming Koi.  A fully-featured settings screen allows you select from different colors of fish, different backgrounds, what plants are present, and more.  Enable rain and see the water surface ripple!NOTE: Our watch faces require Android 5.0 on your Wear device.  They fully respect sleep mode, and will fade in the moving background when you wake the device.  Both round and square faces are fully supported.Check your Android Wear app to set!We don't yet have a video for this product, but you can check out the behavior of the live wallpaper version here : http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fishnoodle.koipond
descriptionHTML:
Why settle for just hands that move? Enjoy moving water explored by peaceful fish!

Featuring a selection of modern and abstract watch faces, you can pick the style of timekeeping that appeals to you. Choose your favorite typeface. Enable display of features such as a compass, moon phase, battery remaining, and current date. Show only the features you need. If a notification is present, the face will smoothly reduce to fill the remaining space.

Behind the watch face itself is a crystal-clear pond full of swimming Koi. A fully-featured settings screen allows you select from different colors of fish, different backgrounds, what plants are present, and more. Enable rain and see the water surface ripple!

NOTE: Our watch faces require Android 5.0 on your Wear device. They fully respect sleep mode, and will fade in the moving background when you wake the device. Both round and square faces are fully supported.

Check your Android Wear app to set!

We don't yet have a video for this product, but you can check out the behavior of the live wallpaper version here : http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fishnoodle.koipond
comments: Had to uninstall Although i liked this on my Huawei,and Zenwatch 2 smartwatches  and it looked just as good as the phone and tablet app. I had to uninstall it because  the background customization and watch face options havent worked in the settings, fix this and definitely will reinstall

Really nice...... Any chance on being able to change the colour of the clocks and perhaps an option for the length of time the screen stays on in any future updates ? Also...... Great whites would look pretty cool ðŸ˜‚
Excellent good job Sencilla pero muy funcional gracias por esta aplicacion
Love it It's been a great watch face and worked well until I got a new phone and had to reset watch. Now it has a black gap on the top like on the bottom of my 360.  Any ideas?
It's ok... It's nice like the version for phones and tablets... But it keeps freezing up my Moto 360.... Always gives me an application not responding... But it's nice...
Koi watch face It's a good face but I found its very heavy on the battery on my sony smart watch 3 a shame or it would be 5 stars
recentChanges: - Fixed 'flat tire' handling on Motorola devices
- New pref to allow full frame watch markings on flat-tire devices
- Can display mini digital time on analog faces
- Watch faces resize to get out of the way of notifications
